Html:
I am a feral druid and use both the bear and cat models on a regular basis.Â  I am wondering if there is an option to only show one instance of each item with the best available gems instead of seeing one item at or near the top of the list with 12 different gem combinations.

The next question would be if this is possible is it also possible at the same time to view items with best-in-slot gems for both bear and cat models (because they would obviously be different gems)?

We are currently planning a change to how gemmings are handled which should help your problem.

For now, there's no way to only show one instance of an item, unless you delete the other instances. You can use the default gemming feature in the tools menu to quickly add/change gemmings and delete other gemmings, but that won't leave them for the other model.
OK, thanks a lot for the quick reply and all of the hard work on the application, you're the man!
